item.description:
In the minds of many, the only elements one needs to capture stunning images for a fashion spread or Fashion Ad is a skilled photographer, a pretty model, and some nice clothes. While these elements are key, there is an often overlooked piece of the puzzle that separates the good photos from the amazing ones: Art Direction.

Come explore this fascinating side of Fashion Communication as we discuss and put on a mockup (Read: very simple) Photo shoot and discuss the Styling and Art that is Art Directing.

Local professionals, including our very own Ron Ranere will be leading the discussion and photoshoot.

If you have any topics you want to see covered (read: overview) or know some local Art directors and stylists that you think can add to or co-lead the discussion (including yourself), feel free to let us know.

Due to the activities that will be taking place. Space will be limited so make sure to RSVP early.
item.how_to_find_us: A sign will be on the door.
item.name: The Art of the Photoshoot: Art Direction & Styling
